el.ti.ti.ee nayaka wi.prabhakarange mawa ta saha nandaniyata indiyanu baladharin kamaththa dakwanne nam indiyawata yannata awasara laba dennata sudanam bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.ada madhyawediyaku nangu prashnayakata pilithuru laba demin janadhipathiwaraya me bawa pawasu bawa indiya madhya uputa dakwayi.eheth prabhakaran ge mawa wana parwathi pilleyi mahathmiya ho nandaniya wana erambu mahathmiya ho thaman indiyawata ho wenath ratakata yamata sudanam bawak me wanathuruth prasiddhiye pawasa na.tha.ese wuwada indiyanu di.em .em .ke pakshaye nayaka wayiko pasugiyada pawasa thibune thamalnaduwei wesena raාjendran namathi gnyathiyeku me dedena thamanta laba dena lesa illa sitina bawayi.

basnahira saha dakunu palath sabhawala pradhana thanathuru sandaha niyojithayan path kirima, ema palath sabhawala aandu paksha manthriwarun kandawa kerena sakachchawakin anathuruwa sidu karana bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye mahalekam, saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasiya.palath sabha deke sabhapathi, sabha nayaka saha aandu pakshaye pradhana sanwidhayaka yana thanathuru sandaha sudussan me anuwa aandu pakshaye manthriwarunge ekangathawa matha sidu kerena bawa palath deke maha amathiwaru, amathiwaru saha manthriwaru diwurum dime ulelata janadhipathi lekam karyalaye di ek wemin amathiwaraya eeye (04) prakasha keleya.shri lanka nidahas pakshaya hara eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye anakuth pakshawalata himi thanathuru sambandhayen ema paksha samanga kerena sakachchawakin anathuruwa thiranaya karana bawath amathiwaraya prakasha keleya..
